vista.graph
Interface LayoutMediator

All Known Implementing Classes:
GEBorderLayoutMediator
public interface LayoutMediator

Mediates between layout managers to synchronize or exchange layout information

Version:
$Id: LayoutMediator.java,v 1.1 2003/10/02 20:49:03 redwood Exp $
Author:
Nicky Sandhu (DWR).
